name: Hedrun Arnsfirth
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, Hedrun has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The wight attacks twice with Grave Bolt.

actions.name: Grave Bolt
entries: Ranged Spell atk +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Life Drain
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 9 (2d6 + 2 damage) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a {@creature zombie} under Hedrun's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The wight can have no more than twelve {@creature zombie||zombies} under its control at one time.
